This is the index page of the online repository for the PHERGain study. Here is a list of work packages:

* [WP1. Statistical analysis of efficacy endpoints for ASCO 2023](WP1_asco23-efficacy.html)

* [WP2. Regulatory tables of safety data for ASCO 2023](WP2_asco23-safety.html)

* [WP3. Matching of patient ID codes based on their respective tissue sample ID codes](WP3_translational_sample-IDs.html)

* [WP4. Statistical analysis of efficacy endpoints for a manuscript on the concordance of MRI assessments and pCR results](WP4_MRI_pCR.html)

* [WP5. Data management tracker for the 5-year extension of the study](WP5_5y_fu_tracker.html)

* [WP6. Exploratory analysis of health-related quality of life data](WP6_HRQoL.html)
